mapper.insert: insert into tables (table_catalog, table_schema, `table_name`, table_type, self_referencing_column_name, reference_generation, `user_defined_type_catalog`, `user_defined_type_schema`, `user_defined_type_name`, is_insertable_into, is_typed, commit_action ) values (#{tableCatalog,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{tableSchema,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{tableName,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{tableType,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{selfReferencingColumnName,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{referenceGeneration,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{userDefinedTypeCatalog,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{userDefinedTypeSchema,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{userDefinedTypeName,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{isInsertableInto,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{isTyped,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{commitAction,jdbcType=DISTINCT} )
mapper.select: select table_catalog, table_schema, `table_name`, table_type, self_referencing_column_name, reference_generation, `user_defined_type_catalog`, `user_defined_type_schema`, `user_defined_type_name`, is_insertable_into, is_typed, commit_action from tables
